channel.title: Present on Build green software applications on Azure
channel.description: Recent content in Present your solution on Build green software applications on Azure

item.title: Prepare presentation
item.description: Directions Groups prepare for the final presentation using the presentation checklist. Presentation checklist Warning Your final presentation must include the following slides. Step 1. The customer case study Customer case study key points. Main characteristics of the current customer environment. Solutions to customer needs. Responses to customer objections. Step 2. Architect a solution Proposed solution diagram that meets or exceeds all the customer requirements from the case study and customer needs sections.

item.title: Closeout
item.description: Groups take turns presenting. The group not presenting: Role-plays as the customer. Asks questions. Provides feedback. Use the worksheet to take notes about your teamâ€™s strengths and areas of improvement. Teams share their presentation.
